column5: Freshly painted inside and out with beautiful beach colors and expanded beach side amazing, beautiful, spacious and very comfortable home only one minute walk from the beautiful sparkling sand of Surfside Beach.Fully stocked kitchen with modern appliances and a wine chiller for that perfect glass of your favorite wine.Very large bedrooms and a huge living room with comfy furniture to accommodate your large gatherings.Come have fun in our beautiful home and enjoy life at the Beach.
